snippet.title: Otome Chat Connection : Messaging App Dating Simulation
snippet.description:
✨Download✨
iOS : https://apps.apple.com/us/app/otome-chat-connection/id1522665361
Android : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.seec.lite.sim.henmachi.en

-----
Receive messages from gorgeous guys!
Who will you choose?

‘Hi, do you have time to chat?' 
‘What are you doing?'
Gorgeous men would like to chat with you!

A childhood friend, a high school student, a businessman... 
All kinds of gorgeous men are sending you messages. 
Chat with them to develop relationships with them.
Who knows, they might even ask you out a date...? 
With Date Stories featuring full voice acting and illustrations. 
Let's enjoy hearing the voice of your favorite character.

This is the perfect game for players who would like to develop their relationships with many gorgeous guys!

◆ Game Features
- Free to play!
- The Date Stories feature full voice acting and illustrations! 
- After completing the questlines of all the characters, something special will happen between you and your favorite character?
- Perfect for playing when you have some spare time!

◆ Perfect for people who: 
- Like love romance films, drama series, and novels. 
- Like Otome games, manga for girls, and dating sims. 
- Like visual novels. 
- Like texting games on message apps.
- Like casual games where they can to develop relationships with many characters. 
- Would like to chat with gorgeous 'ikemen' guys.
- Would like to have fun with various good-looking guys. 
- Like beautiful illustrations. 
- Would like to enjoy a game that they can play in their spare time.
- Would like to read love romance stories between gorgeous guys and them.
- And for anyone who enjoys Otome games!
